title: Louise Redknapp 'spotted kissing' hunky footballer/model John Halls on night out
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Louise Redknapp has reportedly been spotted kissing hunky footballer-turned-model John Halls on a night out in London.

The single pop star, 44, who divorced husband Jamie last year, is said to have met John earlier this year when he auditioned to play her lover in her Stretch music video.

They are believed to have exchanged some "flirty banter" before getting close during an outing to a private members' club.

According to The Sun , they were seen smooching, but Louise decided against pursuing the romance.

A source said: "John and Louise were introduced through work and had an instant rapport.

(Image: Hewitt / SplashNews.com)

"He seemed pretty keen, and they enjoyed some flirtatious banter over the spring period.

“During one boozy night out with pals at Soho House they were all over each other, snogging one anothers faces off.

"But Louise is quite reserved, and nothing more happened."

(Image: Getty Images)

The former Eternal singer, who has two sons with Jamie, reportedly ditched John because she didn't want any extra complications in her life.

John played for Arsenal as well as England's under 20s before turning to modelling.

Louise has been single single splitting from Jamie in early 2018 after almost 20 years of marriage.

They divorced later that year, but remain amicable for the sake of their sons Charles, 15, and Beau, 10.

Mirror Online has contacted a representative for Louise for comment.

description: Single pop star Louise Redknapp was reportedly seen getting close to the former Arsenal player as they hit the town together in London
